pages.title: Insect Bottling
pages.text: Various $(thing)Insects/$, such as $(thing)Bees/$, $(thing)Silverfish/$, and $(thing)Endermites/$ can now be bottled by using an $(item)Empty Bottle/$ on them.$(br2)The $(thing)Insect/$ can then be released by $(bold)Right Clicking/$ the ground with the $(item)Bottle/$.
